title: What's new in v2.54.0
content:
Features:
• Italian support
• Traditional Chinese support

Enhancements:
• Canvas size limit relies on total pixel count instead of individual dimensions
• Can drag-n-drop multiple images to import as artworks at once
• Image drag-n-drop persists the file name
• Gesture pad has a new toggle to auto-switch to the previous tool if the assigned tool is already selected
• More UI enhancements

Fixes:
• .px files don't open when tapped in the Files app
• Space + drag to pan sometimes doesn't work
• Some UI issues with palette
• Fixed issues with tilemap
